dcterms:creator: Ben Mildenhall
Pratul P Srinivasan
Rodrigo Ortiz-Cayon
Nima Khademi Kalantari

dcterms:description: The LLFF dataset contains 8 complex forward-facing scenes designed for novel view synthesis tasks, providing a benchmark for evaluating NeRF methods.
dcterms:title: LLFF

dcterms:creator: Rasmus Jensen
Anders Dahl
George Vogiatzis
Engin Tola
Henrik Aanæs
dcterms:description: The DTU dataset is an object-level dataset used for evaluating multi-view stereo methods, containing 15 scenes with controlled backgrounds.
dcterms:title: DTU

dcterms:description: NVS-RGBD is a newly collected dataset containing real-world depth maps captured by consumer-level depth sensors such as Azure Kinect, ZED 2, and iPhone 13 Pro.
dcterms:title: NVS-RGBD

dcterms:creator: Johannes Lutz Schönberger
Jan-Michael Frahm
dcterms:description: COLMAP is a general-purpose Structure-from-Motion and Multi-View Stereo pipeline that provides sparse and dense 3D reconstructions.
dcterms:title: COLMAP

dcterms:creator: Anpei Chen
Zexiang Xu
Fuqiang Zhao
Xiaoshuai Zhang
Fanbo Xiang
Jingyi Yu
Hao Su
dcterms:description: MVS is a dataset used for evaluating multi-view stereo methods, specifically designed for fast and generalizable radiance field reconstruction.
dcterms:title: MVS

dcterms:description: MiDaS is a depth estimation model used to provide depth information for various scenes, rather than a dataset.
dcterms:title: MiDaS
